Okay so when I DL stuff from here to my Bitcomet, when I try to move the files to a specific folder so that I can view them via Windows Media center on my Xbox 360, it wont let me move the file without first deleting it from my Bitcomet.  I want to be able to seed these but do not know how to fix this problem.
When I try to move the files I DL to a specific folder it wont let me until I delete it our of my Bitcomet so I cannot seed them.  What am I doing wrong and how can I fix this so that I can seed.
I have bitcomet too.  Just change the download location to the folder that you want to play them from.  Go to tools - default directory.
